## Lab - {{< fa laptop-file >}} Download this week's here - {{< fa paintbrush >}} Upload the rendered html file to Canvas [here](https://canvas.brown.edu/courses/1094972/assignments) - {{< fa graduation-cap >}} Review the commented solutions after class here ## Assignments - {{< fa lightbulb >}} Work through [Software Setup](../resources/00-software-setup.qmd) before class next week - {{< fa chalkboard-user >}} Complete QSS Tutorial 0: Introduction to R; QSS Tutorial 1: Measurement 1 ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # After completing the software setup you should be able to to run the following to launch the tutorials learnr::run_tutorial("00-intro", package = "qsslearnr") learnr::run_tutorial("01-measurement1", package = "qsslearnr") ``` ::: - {{< fa paintbrush >}} Upload the rendered html tutorial files to Canvas [here](https://canvas.brown.edu/courses/1094972/assignments)
